quote_content: Nakalimutan na ng tao ang kabanalan n'ya, na mas marami pa s'yang alam kesa sa nakasulat sa Transcript of Records n'ya, mas marami pa s'yang kayang gawin kesa sa nakalista sa resume n'ya, at mas mataas ang halaga n'ya kesa sa presyong nakasulat sa payslip n'ya tuwing sweldo.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Without music, life would be a mistake.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them.
